title: Football Manager Handheld 2012 v3.3 Android
description:
Football Manager Handheld 2012 v3.3
Requirements: Android 2.2 and up
Overview: The WorldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best-selling Football management game comes to Android.


The worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most popular sports management game meets the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most popular mobile platform with Football Manager Handheld 2012 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ now available on Android.

Football Manager HandheldÃ¢â€žÂ¢ 2012 allows you to take control of the greatest job on earth wherever you are and whenever you want. YOU make the difference!

Take the hot-seat at any club from a choice of leagues in 12 countries, and assume full control of transfers, training, tactics and managing your team live during matchdays Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a job which can be tackled in either short, commute-sized sessions or in mammoth sittings on the sofa.

ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an experience for everyone as fans can choose to pursue an entire career in a particular countryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s league or face up to the handheld-exclusive Ã¢â‚¬ËœChallenge ModeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ which offers a particular short-term scenario with a clear goal to be achieved. Whichever mode is chosen, the manager will deal with real-life situations involving real players, as researched by Sports InteractiveÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s huge global scouting network.

The 12 countries with playable leagues in Football Manager Handheld for Android are Australia, Belgium, Brazil, England, France, Germany, Holland, Italy, Portugal, Scotland, Spain and Wales.

The game can be played in four languages; English, French, Italian and Spanish.

Football Manager Handheld for Android has been designed for Android devices using OS 2.2 and above (please check on the Google Play store for a full list of compatible devices). For further information please go to http://www.sigames.com or http://www.footballmanager.com.

(An additional data download will occur the first time the game is launched. The download size will be between 7-19MB depending on your device and will take approximately 3 minutes via WiFi, 6 minutes over cellular.)
